title: LD50
alt: The dose is much lower when administered orally. We're still trying to get the paper into the needles for subcutaneous injection.
transcript:
[A figure in a white coat lies on the floor, crushed beneath a giant pile of binders & paper. Megan and Cueball in white coats stand next to him, looking on. Megan is holding a clipboard.]
The LD50 of toxicity data is 2 kilograms per kilogram.
